citations.narrative:
The contingency plan provided during inspection had not been reviewed since December 2022. Reviewing the
contingency plan yearly provides an opportunity to include any changes from the previous year and establish appropriate
procedures for newly identified emergencies and disasters. The research facility must review the contingency plan to
ensure that it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (l)(1) of this section. Correct by 11/16/2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.38(l)(2) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
The contingency plan provided during inspection had not been reviewed since December 2022. Reviewing the 
contingency plan yearly provides an opportunity to include any changes from the previous year and establish appropriate 
procedures for newly identified emergencies and disasters. The research facility must review the contingency plan to 
ensure that it adequately addresses the criteria listed in paragraph (l)(1) of this section. Correct by 11/16/2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
